SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.billing

Interface IVmBillingPolicy

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseCustomerVmBillingPolicy, EC2OnDemandPolicy, GoogleOnDemandPolicy
public interface IVmBillingPolicy
Defines the billing policy of a cloud provider with respect to pricing VMs. NOTE! - the implementations of this interface are completely independent from the pricing properties defined in the data centre objects.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

      double nexChargeTime(Vm vm)
      Returns the next charging time.
      Parameters:

    • normalisedCostPerMinute

      BigDecimal normalisedCostPerMinute(Vm vm)
      Returns a normalised cost of the VM for 1 minute. This operation is optional.
      Parameters:
      vm - - the VM to check for. Must not be null;
      Returns:
      a normalised cost of the VM for 1 minute.
